title: When to Fine-Tune
title1: When to Fine-Tune: A Developer's Guide to Customizing Language Models
title2: When to Fine-Tune Language Models: From Generalist to Specialist
description: Discover when and why you should fine-tune base language models like LLaMA to enhance performance for specialized tasks. Learn how fine-tuning transforms general models into experts tailored to your application's needs.
author: Justin Torre
